医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
莱姆病善后护理：对持续症状的新见解研究探讨了莱姆疏螺旋体病 (LB) 治疗后持续症状的原因，揭示了社会和身体功能、心理困扰和合并症等因素是关键决定因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/Lyme-disease-aftercare-new-insights-into-persistent-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/Lyme-disease-aftercare-new-insights-into-persistent-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e1ca54eb-ed1b-4441-b9df-6895fe85f760 Wed, 29 Nov 2023 17:31:00 -0500 Lyme disease aftercare: new insights into persistent symptoms
针对人格特征可能是降低痴呆风险的一种方法加州大学戴维斯分校和西北大学的研究人员进行的一项新分析显示，具有认真负责、外向和积极情绪等性格特征的人比那些神经质和消极情绪的人更不可能被诊断出患有痴呆症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/Targeting-personality-traits-could-be-a-way-to-reduce-dementia-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/Targeting-personality-traits-could-be-a-way-to-reduce-dementia-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dc2f50e3-69c4-471c-9d93-d4c0692c539c Wed, 29 Nov 2023 14:31:29 -0500 Targeting personality traits could be a way to reduce dementia risk
人工智能预测药物分子化学变化的理想位点研究人员开发了一种人工智能模型，可以预测药物分子在何处可以发生化学改变。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/AI-predicts-ideal-sites-for-chemical-alterations-in-drug-molecules.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/AI-predicts-ideal-sites-for-chemical-alterations-in-drug-molecules.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1937f914-2043-4efd-a210-2890d58a37e8 Wed, 29 Nov 2023 14:25:37 -0500 AI predicts ideal sites for chemical alterations in drug molecules
研究发现早期冠心病与痴呆症之间存在联系根据今天发表在《美国心脏协会杂志》（开放获取期刊）上的一项新研究，被诊断患有冠心病的成年人，尤其是 45 岁之前的成年人，在以后的生活中患痴呆症、阿尔茨海默病和血管性痴呆的风险可能会增加。 ，美国心脏协会的同行评审期刊。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/Study-finds-link- Between-early-coronary-heart-disease-and-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/Study-finds-link- Between-early-coronary-heart-disease-and-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=61ef278c-22b7-4641-8ded-0580069e4e50 Wed, 29 Nov 2023 14:16:04 -0500 Study finds link between early coronary heart disease and dementia
人工智能可能会带来更客观的多动症诊断研究人员使用人工智能 (AI) 分析患有和不患有注意力缺陷/多动障碍 (ADHD) 的青少年的专门大脑 MRI 扫描，发现 ADHD 个体的九个大脑白质束存在显着差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/AI-may-lead-to-more-objective-ADHD-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/AI-may-lead-to-more-objective-ADHD-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c2879d81-74fe-4ebe-94c9-06022cdd9264 Wed, 29 Nov 2023 13:59:32 -0500 AI may lead to more objective ADHD diagnosis
影像学方法为颈部肌肉参与原发性头痛提供了客观证据根据今天在北美放射学会年会上发表的一项研究，研究人员已经确定了颈部肌肉如何与原发性头痛有关的客观证据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/Imaging-approach-provides-objective-evidence-for-the-involvement-of-neck-muscles-in-primary-headaches.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/Imaging-approach-provides-objective-evidence-for-the-involvement-of-neck-muscles-in-primary-headaches.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f17ed60a-e31a-4d89-9f03-77fc0d85307e Wed, 29 Nov 2023 13:56:24 -0500 Imaging approach provides objective evidence for the involvement of neck muscles in primary headaches
AI模型准确预测多个种族的乳腺癌风险根据今天在北美放射学会年会上发表的研究，仅使用乳房 X 光图像生物标志物开发的深度学习人工智能 (AI) 模型可以准确预测导管原位癌 (DCIS) 和浸润性癌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/AI-model-accurately-predicts-breast-cancer-risk-across-multiple-races.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/AI-model-accurately-predicts-breast-cancer-risk-across-multiple-races.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4702a9f6-5ae2-4817-be0e-3e23d379500e Wed, 29 Nov 2023 13:51:51 -0500 AI model accurately predicts breast cancer risk across multiple races
PlaqueTec 在 BIOPATTERN 试验中招募了前 10 名患者PlaqueTec 是一家识别内型特异性生物标志物以推进冠状动脉疾病 (CAD) 精准医疗的公司，今天宣布，该公司已获得英国药品和保健品监管机构 (MHRA) 的批准，可在招募首批 10 名受试者后继续进行 BIOPATTERN 试验患有冠心病的患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/PlaqueTec-recruits-first-ten-病人-in-BIOPATTERN-Trial.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/PlaqueTec-recruits-first-ten-病人-in-BIOPATTERN-Trial.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8e09a178-c2b8-47e6-933c-ba083b3e125e Wed, 29 Nov 2023 10:21:00 -0500
使用 INTEGRA 移液器加速抗体治疗INTEGRA Biosciences 向英国初创公司 Creasallis 授予了 50 个 EVOLVE 手动移液器、价值 1000 美元的 GRIPTIPS® 移液器吸头以及各种实验室配件，帮助加速其在提高治疗性抗体对肿瘤的渗透性方面的开创性研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/Accelerating-antibody-therapy-with-INTEGRA-pipettes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/Accelerating-antibody-therapy-with-INTEGRA-pipettes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8fe51e4f-7844-41ed-8a33-7a58129e8d6e Wed, 29 Nov 2023 10:13:00 -0500
怀孕期间的 COVID-19 与较高的早产风险有关；早期采用疫苗显示出保护作用孕产妇 2019 年冠状病毒病 (COVID-19) 感染对婴儿健康的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/COVID-19-in-pregnancy-tied-to-higher-preterm-birth-risk3b-early-vaccine-adoption-shows-protective-effect.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231129/COVID-19-in-pregnancy-tied-to-higher-preterm-birth-risk3b-early-vaccine-adoption-shows-protective-effect.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=db2486fe-8814-4c77-84da-f6b9ec2365c1 Wed, 29 Nov 2023 08:47:00 -0500 COVID-19 in pregnancy tied to higher preterm birth risk; early vaccine adoption shows protective effect
